${ModID}:Reading.NAME: Reading
${ModID}:Reading.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, ${ModID}:Stitch a *Read to a random card in your hand.
${ModID}:Reading.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, ${ModID}:Stitch a *%s to a random card in your hand.

${ModID}:Knot.NAME: Knot
${ModID}:Knot.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Bind to a random enemy. NL ${ModID}:Stitch.

${ModID}:Pincushion.NAME: Pincushion
${ModID}:Pincushion.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Flurry: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Stitch.

${ModID}:Rethread.NAME: Rethread
${ModID}:Rethread.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand. NL stslib:Persist !stslib:persist!.

${ModID}:CopyAndPaste.NAME: Copy and Paste
${ModID}:CopyAndPaste.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play the same card twice in a turn, shuffle a copy of it that costs 0 into your discard pile.
${ModID}:CopyAndPaste.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play the same card twice in a turn, shuffle a copy of it that costs 0 into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Patchwork.NAME: Patchwork
${ModID}:Patchwork.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Stitch a copy of this to a random card in your draw pile.
